name: qwksearch-api-docs
description: Docusaurus autogenerated from OpenAPI spec & Typedoc functions (with Lunr Search)

scripts.docs: concurrently "npx docusaurus serve --dir ../web/static/docs" "wait-on http://localhost:3000; opener http://localhost:3000"
scripts.build:docs: TARGET=../web/static/docs; rm -rf $TARGET/*; mkdir -p $TARGET; npm run build:docs:openapi; DOCUSAURUS_IGNORE_SSG_WARNINGS=true npx docusaurus build --out-dir $TARGET; npm run docs
scripts.build:docs:openapi: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx docusaurus clean-api-docs  all   ; NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx docusaurus  gen-api-docs all
